mapper.sql: province_id, province_name, province_code, ordering, status, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from s_province where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.delete: delete from s_province where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into s_province (province_id, province_name, province_code, ordering, status, ins_id, ins_ymdhms, upd_id, upd_ymdhms, upd_eac, del_flag) values (#{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordering,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update s_province
province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ordering = #{ordering,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)

update s_province
ordering = #{ordering,jdbcType=BIGINT},
province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)

update s_province set province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ordering = #{ordering,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, ins_id = #{insId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ins_ymdhms = #{insYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_id = #{updId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upd_ymdhms = #{updYmdhms,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upd_eac = #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)
mapper.select:
select
from s_province
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND del_flag='0'

select
from s_province where status = '0' AND del_flag='0' and province_id not in (SELECT sua.area_id FROM s_user_area sua)
